forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 62. West southwest wind 10 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 9 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
This morning in Downtown San Francisco, the skyline emerges under a veil of clarity, punctuated by the sun’s gentle rays spilling over the city’s renowned architecture. Although a thin layer of fog lingers in the distance, cloaking the horizon with whispers of mist, the day promises a burst of sunshine as it climbs toward its peak brightness. With a mild high approaching 62, the west-southwest winds stir softly through the streets, offering a gentle reminder of the ocean's proximity. 

As twilight approaches, the atmosphere suggests a pleasant evening; the temperatures will cool toward 52, allowing a refreshing reprieve beneath a partly clouded sky. It’s wise to layer up today—a light jacket or sweater will keep you comfortable as you stroll through the Presidio or explore the vibrant Mission District. The weather beckons for a leisurely coffee on the sidewalk of a local café, perhaps followed by an amble along Crissy Field to soak in the views of the Golden Gate Bridge. This day, unchained from the usual fog that characterizes the Bay Area, invites not only an appreciation of the landscape but also a pause to relish the simplicity of a fine San Francisco morning.
